courseDetails.title: Introduction to Autodesk 3ds Max 2023 UI in Urdu / Hindi
courseDetails.shortDescription: Get into the future of CGI!
targetAudiences: In this video, we'll be covering the complete user interface of Autodesk 3ds Max 2022. We'll start from the top down and work our way down, covering all the features of the 3ds Max user interface.  If you're new to 3ds Max or you just need a refresher on the basics, this video is for you! By the end of this video, you'll be able to understand the complete user interface and use it to your advantage!
we will be discussing the basics of Autodesk 3ds Max 2022. This video is intended for users who are relatively new to 3ds Max
We will focus on the different elements of the user interface and explore the different modifiers that are available.
We will also look at how to create a 3D logo using spline modeling
By the end of this video, you'll be able to understand and work with the user interface of Autodesk 3ds Max 2022 like a pro!
